## Color3.toColor4() method

Returns a new Color4 object from the current Color3 and the given alpha

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toColor4(alpha?: number): Color4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  alpha | <code>number</code> | defines the alpha component on the new Color4 object (default is 1) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color4`

a new Color4 object
